preparation.raw_text:
1. In a well-ventilated lab, wear appropriate safety gear (gloves, goggles, mask). 
 2. Measure 32 g of oxygen carefully using a precision scale. 
 3. Measure 30 g of phosphorus using the same scale. 
 4. Measure 300 g of lead accurately. 
 5. Measure 90 g of vanadium. 
 6. Combine all measured ingredients in a clean, heat-resistant mixing container. Stir well to achieve a uniform mixture.
